name: Midas mevBTC
description: mevBTC is a token structured to track the performance of BTC-denominated strategies deployed across on-chain markets and ecosystems. It provides tokenized exposure to a set of strategies designed to maintain BTC-based positioning while interacting with decentralized protocols. The underlying strategy is monitored by MEV Capital, acting as the appointed Risk Manager, responsible for overseeing protocol selection, risk parameters, and ongoing operational monitoring.
